H0.text: what countries have english as their official language. United States

H1.text: what countries have english as their official language. United Kingdom

H2.text: what countries have english as their official language. Australia

H3.text: what countries have english as their official language. Canada

A4.text: English holds official status in numerous countries within the Commonwealth of Nations.

A5.text: English is an official language (de facto or de jure) of the following countries and territories.

A6.text: As of 2025, 32 out of the 50 states of the United States have designated English as their official language.

A7.text: The United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Antigua and Barbuda, and the United States do not have English as a de jure official language, but it is the de facto working language for their governments.
